workshoptitle: The Adventure of the Stolen Pumpkin: A Sherlock Holmes Mystery

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setting Up the Database and Clue Table
tutorials.description: Create a simple database and table to store mystery clues about the stolen pumpkin.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Vectorizing the Evidence - Transforming Clues into Embeddings
tutorials.description: Learn how to import and use the all-MiniLM-L12-v2 model to vectorize textual clues for AI-powered search.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Watson Tries His Hand at Deduction - The Keyword Search Investigation
tutorials.description: See how traditional keyword searches miss hidden connections between clues.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Holmes Applies AI Vector Search to the Problem
tutorials.description: Use AI vector search to discover connections that solve the pumpkin theft mystery.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
